When Take the Space enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and trample until end of turn. Nopon you control also gain vigilance until end of turn.

Trample
The first time you activate an ability of a permanent each turn, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {G}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Nopon creature token.
